MacroOp.Name: OMNI_NO_EXTERN_CONSTS
MacroOp.Brief: If defined, Omni constants will not have external linkage
MacroOp.Considerations: Know that you are changing the linkage from static to extern with regards to the constant values in the Omni framework.
MacroOp.Description: The constant string values in the framework are marked @c extern as their default linkage. To change this behavior to have all string constants be marked as @c static instead of @c extern you can define this macro option, there's no additional files to exclude as this flag disables portions of the code that pertain to the extern values.
MacroOp.Notes: The extern'd values reside in @h framework.cpp @h (which is always built with the framework, but if the macro is enabled, the extern portions are not compiled in).
MacroOp.Synopsis: If this macro is defined, the constants within the Omni framework will not be extern'd and instead will exist as const values in the headers to be included.
